articles.author: Akayla Gardner, Justin Sink, Jorge Valero
articles.title: US to Sign Mideast-India Rail and Shipping Deal During G-20 - Bloomberg
articles.description: The US said it plans to sign a joint infrastructure plan with India, Middle Eastern countries and the European Union aimed at connecting them via a network of railways and sea routes, a development that comes as China builds its influence across the energy-ri…
